name: Phosphofructokinase
gene_reaction_rule: (PFKL and PFKM) or (PFKL and PFKP) or PFKP or PFKL or PFKM

name: Enolase
gene_reaction_rule: ENO1 or ENO2 or ENO3 or (ENO1 and ENO2) or (ENO1 and ENO3) or (ENO2 and ENO3)

name: L-lactate dehydrogenase
gene_reaction_rule: LDHB or (LDHA and LDHB) or LDHA

name: Deoxyhemoglobin binding to 2,3-diphosphoglycerate
gene_reaction_rule: HBA or HBB or HBD or HBE1 or HBG1 or HBG2 or HBM or HBQ1 or HBZ

name: Oxyhemoglobin binding
gene_reaction_rule: HBA or HBB or HBD or HBE1 or HBG1 or HBG2 or HBM or HBQ1 or HBZ

name: Oxyhemoglobin binding (Protonated Carbamino Hemoglobin)
gene_reaction_rule: HBA or HBB or HBD or HBE1 or HBG1 or HBG2 or HBM or HBQ1 or HBZ

name: Nonenzymatic reduction of methemoglobin (Cytochrome b5)
gene_reaction_rule: (CYB5A and HBA) or (CYB5A and HBB) or (CYB5A and HBD) or (CYB5A and HBE1) or (CYB5A and HBG1) or (CYB5A and HBG2) or (CYB5A and HBM) or (CYB5A and HBZ) or (CYB5A and HBQ1) or (CYB5B and HBA) or (CYB5B and HBB) or (CYB5B and HBD) or (CYB5B and HBE1) or (CYB5B and HBG1) or (CYB5B and HBG2) or (CYB5B and HBM) or (CYB5B and HBZ) or (CYB5B and HBQ1)

name: Auto-oxidation of oxyhemoglobin
gene_reaction_rule: HBA or HBB or HBD or HBE1 or HBG1 or HBG2 or HBM or HBQ1 or HBZ

name: Inorganic diphosphatase
gene_reaction_rule: PPA1 or LHPP or PRUNE1 or PPA2

name: Na + /K + exchanging ATPase
reaction: atp_c + h2o_c + 2.0 k_e + 3.0 na1_c --> adp_c + h_c + 2.0 k_c + 3.0 na1_e + pi_c
gene_reaction_rule: (ATP1A1 and ATP1B1) or (ATP1A1 and ATP1B2) or (ATP1A1 and ATP1B3) or (ATP1A3 and ATP1B1) or (ATP1A3 and ATP1B2) or (ATP1A3 and ATP1B3) or (ATP1A4 and ATP1B1) or (ATP1A4 and ATP1B2) or (ATP1A4 and ATP1B3)

name: L-lactate transport via proton symport
gene_reaction_rule: (SLC16A1 and BSG) or (SLC16A1 and EMB) or (SLC16A7 and BSG) or (SLC16A7 and EMB) or SLC16A1 or SLC16A7

name: Pyruvate transport in via proton symport
gene_reaction_rule: (SLC16A1 and BSG) or (SLC16A1 and EMB) or (SLC16A7 and BSG) or (SLC16A7 and EMB) or SLC16A1 or SLC16A7

name: Transport of CO2
gene_reaction_rule: AQP1 or (RHAG and RHCE and RHD) or (RHAG and RHCE) or RHAG

name: Transport of ammonium
gene_reaction_rule: AQP3 or AQP1 or (RHAG and RHCE and RHD) or (RHAG and RHCE) or RHAG

name: P-type Ca(2+) transporter (1:1 stoichiometry)
reaction: atp_c + ca2_c + h2o_c --> adp_c + ca2_e + h_c + pi_c

name: Calcium (II) import
gene_reaction_rule: CACNA1A or GRIA1 or TRPC6 or TRPV2 or PIEZO1 or P2RX1 or P2RX2 or P2RX7 or PANX1 or TMEM109 or VDAC1

name: Transport of potassium
gene_reaction_rule: KCNN4 or KCNAB2 or KCNK5 or PIEZO1 or P2RX1 or P2RX2 or P2RX7 or PANX1 or GRIA1 or TMEM109 or SLC22A4 or VDAC1

name: Sodium leak
gene_reaction_rule: SCN9A or SCN4A or PIEZO1 or P2RX1 or P2RX2 or P2RX7 or PANX1 or GRIA1 or VDAC1

name: Transport of beta-D-glucose
gene_reaction_rule: SLC2A2 or SLC2A3 or SLC2A1 or SLC2A4 or SLC2A14
